author: RTÉ News
title: Northern Ireland restrictions extended until May
description: Stormont First Minister Arlene Foster has confirmed that Covid-19 restrictions in Northern Ireland will remain in place for a further three weeks, and will be reviewed again at that stage.
content:
Stormont First Minister Arlene Foster  has confirmed that Covid-19 restrictions in Northern Ireland will remain in place for a further three weeks, and will be reviewed again at that stage.
